title: Spotted: Next Generation TRP Rear Derailleur & carbon Crankset?
content:
It’s that time of year again. Well, technically it’s much later in the year, but last week we were finally back walking the booths at the Sea Otter Classic. Along with catching up with old friends, we were on the lookout for new products—especially those hiding in plain sight. From the looks of things, we

author: Zach Overholt
